title: Running Away
description: Ros and her friends are sick and tired of fighting. Each day is harder than the last. All they want is to get away from everything and find a place where they can stop, rest and build their home... their fortress. So they make a plan. Now all they have to do is get there. But can they make it before itâ€™s too late? Exhaustion. Distress. Survival. The fight to live continues in "Running Away" the fourth book in The Ravaged Land Series!
author: Kellee L. Greene
